1.text: Draw a small freehand circle in the center of the page for the center of the rose.

2.text: Add another irregular oval shape at a diagonal base of the above circle for the first petal.

3.text: Join a curved line from the small circle to the oval shape for the second petal.

4.text: Complete the first set of petals around the centre by joining yet another curved line to the above.

5.text: Begin drawing the first spiral around the earlier made for the second row of petals.

6.text: Engulf the earlier row of petals by a bigger outer irregular curve for the third row of petals.

7.text: Join further outer petals of the rose with wavy lines joining at appropriate places.

8.text: Draw the extreme outer petal  of the rose.

9.text: Detail the rose further with petals and leaves.

10.text: Color the rose red with green leaves adding appropriate shades to it.

11.text: Draw a small spiral in the centre of the page.

12.text: Extend a petal on one side of the spiral.

13.text: Add another petal to the opposite side of the spiral.

14.text: Draw the third petal at the bottom of the spiral joining the above petal shapes.

15.text: Add a small detail in the centre of the spiral of the rose.

16.text: Create a leaf each on either side of the flower with a small midrib each.

17.text: Color the rose with variations of red and green for the leaves.

18.text: Draw a vertical curve in the centre of the page for the guide to the stem of the rose .

19.text: Add thorny details on the left side to the above made curved line.

20.text: Add details also on the right side of the curved line.

21.text: Draw a leaf extending on the top left side of the thorny curve.

22.text: Add couple of more leaves on either side of the thorny stem.

23.text: Add details to the leaves by drawing the midrib and a few veins.

24.text: Start making the flower from its base by drawing the sepals.

25.text: Go ahead with drawing the flower petals from the centre and adding one petal to its right.

26.text: Add further petals of the rose heading upwards to the centre.

27.text: Draw the centre details of the rose petals.

28.text: Detail the leaves with edgy outer blades.

29.text: Erase all unnecessary guides and color the rose and the leaves.

30.text: Enrich the painting by applying appropriate shades and a shadow.
